Parameters: float: Latitude in WGS84 geodetic coordinates -- positive is east.
float: Longitude in WGS84 geodetic coordinates -- positive is north.
float: Altitude in WGS84 geodetic coordinates, in meters.
long: Time at which to evaluate the declination, in milliseconds since January 1, 1970. (approximate is fine -- the declination changes very slowly).
GeomagneticField(float, float, float, lo.Description: Estimate the magnetic field at a given point and time.
GeomagneticField(float, float, float, lo.FullName: public GeomagneticField (float gdLatitudeDeg, float gdLongitudeDeg, float altitudeMeters, long timeMillis)

Returns: The inclination of the magnetic field in degrees -- positive means the magnetic field is rotated downwards.
The X (northward) component of the magnetic field in nanoteslas.
The Y (eastward) component of the magnetic field in nanoteslas.

Parameters: float: Latitude in WGS84 geodetic coordinates -- positive is east.
float: Longitude in WGS84 geodetic coordinates -- positive is north.
float: Altitude in WGS84 geodetic coordinates, in meters.
long: Time at which to evaluate the declination, in milliseconds since January 1, 1970. (approximate is fine -- the declination changes very slowly).
GeomagneticField(float,float,float,long).Description: Estimate the magnetic field at a given point and time.
GeomagneticField(float,float,float,long).FullName: public GeomagneticField (float gdLatitudeDeg, float gdLongitudeDeg, float altitudeMeters, long timeMillis)

Returns: The Z (downward) component of the magnetic field in nanoteslas.
The declination of the horizontal component of the magnetic field from true north, in degrees (i.e. positive means the magnetic field is rotated east that much from true north).
Horizontal component of the field strength in nanoteslas.

ClassDesc: Estimates magnetic field at a given point on Earth, and in particular, to compute the magnetic declination from true north. This uses the World Magnetic Model produced by the United States National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency. More details about the model can be found at
